0.dialouge: Why if it isn't Klay!~ You're a little far from the school you know.
0.speaker: Sirrington

1.dialouge: It's not good to wander off like that...~ not good at all.
1.speaker: Sirrington

2.dialouge: Places like these is where the lizard people make their base you know.
2.speaker: Sirrington

3.dialouge: Spare me your conspiracy theories please.
3.speaker: Klay

4.dialouge:
On my!~ As cold as ever I see.~
Well no matter.
4.speaker: Sirrington

5.dialouge: My compatriots and I have been hard at work recently.~ We have printed pamphlets spreading our message all across the pillar.
5.speaker: Sirrington

6.dialouge:
The truth will come to light as day follows night.~
You'll See!
6.speaker: Sirrington
